name: Mobile IAP
description: Handle in-app purchases (IAP) for Cordova on iOS and Android.

conditions.name: On purchase success
conditions.description: Triggered when a specific product ID has been purchased successfully.

params.name: Product ID
params.description: Product ID that has been purchased successfully.

conditions.name: On any purchase success
conditions.description: Triggered when any product has been purchased successfully.

conditions.name: On purchase failed
conditions.description: Triggered when a specific product ID has failed to be purchased.

params.name: Product ID
params.description: Product ID that has failed to purchase.

conditions.name: On any purchase failed
conditions.description: Triggered when any product has failed to be purchased.

conditions.name: Has product
conditions.description: True if the current user has purchased a given product ID.

params.name: Product ID
params.description: Product ID to check if owned.

conditions.name: Product available
conditions.description: True if the product can be purchased.

params.name: Product ID
params.description: Product ID to check if available.

conditions.name: Is registration complete
conditions.description: True if the store has been registered and is ready to make purchase requests.

conditions.name: On product available
conditions.description: Triggered when the product becomes available for purchase.

params.name: Product ID
params.description: Product ID to check if available.

conditions.name: On any product available
conditions.description: Triggered when a product becomes available for purchase.
conditions.display_text: On any product available for purchase

conditions.name: On product owned
conditions.description: Triggered when a specified non-consumable product becomes owned.

params.name: Product ID
params.description: Product ID to check if owned.

conditions.name: On any product owned
conditions.description: Triggered when a non-consumable product becomes owned.

conditions.name: On transaction finished
conditions.description: Triggered when a transaction finishes. The ID is available in the 'TransactionID' expression.

actions.name: Add product ID
actions.description: Add the product IDs that the app will be using for IAP.

params.name: Product ID
params.description: The product ID you are registering.

params.name: Product Type
params.description: The product type you are registering.

actions.name: Purchase product
actions.description: Prompt the user to purchase a product.

actions.name: Restore purchases
actions.description: Restore the purchases state from the store.

expressions.name: ProductName
expressions.description: Return the name of a product from its ID.

params.name: ProductID
params.description: Product ID to get name from

expressions.name: ProductPrice
expressions.description: Return the formatted price of a product from its ID.

params.name: ProductID
params.description: Product ID to get price from

expressions.name: ProductID
expressions.description: In a trigger, the relevant product ID.

expressions.name: ErrorMessage
expressions.description: In a trigger, an error message if available.

expressions.name: ProductDescription
expressions.description: Return the description of a product from its ID.

params.name: ProductID
params.description: Product ID to get description from

expressions.name: TransactionID
expressions.description: After 'On transaction finished', the ID of the last finished transaction.
